Question & Options:
In the movie 'Thugs of Hindostan' (2018), which of the following statements about Amitabh Bachchan's character Khudabaksh Jhaazi are true?
Options:
A. He is the general of the nawab of Raunakpur.
B. He is the main antagonist of the film.
C. He is the commander of the Thugs.
D. He is Zafira's adoptive father.
Correct Answer: He is the general of the nawab of Raunakpur., He is the commander of the Thugs., He is Zafira's adoptive father.
